title: "Asking the Clergy: Is artificial intelligence a help or hindrance to faith?"
excerpt: "Since the OpenAI ChatGPT program was launched in the fall, it has gone viral, with even a Long Island rabbi using it to “plagiarize” a sermon. This week’s clergy discuss the religious implications of the technology, which uses artificial intelligence (AI) to generate text after a user enters a prompt."
